title: It asks me to reconnect when I finished my game what can I do?
body: unable to join a game after finish the previous one. require me to reconnect a invalid game.

replies.body: Same problem happened to me just now

I have the same issue, finished a game and the end of game stats wouldnt load, hit skip, now thinks the game is still running and wants me to reconnect. If i hit reconnect i get black screen then a failure to connect message, returning to launcher comes up with the game crashed pls reconnect. Tried relogging to no avail, will try running in admin but dont see how it will help
Running the launcher as Admin does nothing (derp)
The same problem and I hope they can fix it.
I have the same issue - been a good hour now
